appearances.title: РИК "Россия 24" : RUSSIA24 : January 2, 2026 6:30am-7:00am MSK
appearances.snippet: it's hard not to believe it, especially after congressman eric burlison showed a video he received from an anonymous informant right at the hearing. filmed by an mq9 reaper drone. the incident itself occurred in october 2024 off the coast of yemen in an area of ​​active operations against the houthis. the footage shows a fast-moving spherical object flying over the water in a straight trajectory. a second drone launches an agm 114 hellfire missile. the missile hits the object, a flash of impact is visible, but it continues its flight without visible damage, bouncing off as if from a wall. congressman burlison even eventually introduced an amendment to declassify all such recordings from the last quarter century, and at the same time create a special investigative commission. the amendment, however, did not pass. however, those who see the machinations of the same notorious deepstate behind the ufo issue are not giving up. a little later , a screening of the new documentary "epoch" was organized in the capitol. appearances.snippet: it's hard not to, especially after congressman eric burlison directly showed a video he received fromn anonymous informant at the hearing, taken from an mq9 reaper drone. the incident itself occurred in october 2024. years ago, off the coast of yemen, in an area of ​​active operations against the houthis, a second drone fired an agm-114 hellfire missile at a fast-moving spherical object flying over the water in a straight trajectory. the missile hit the object, a flash of impact was visible, but it continued flying without visible damage, bouncing off as if from a wall. congressman burlison eventually even introduced an amendment to declassify all such recordings from the past quarter century, and at the same time create... a little later , a screening of the new documentary "the age of disclosure" was held at the capitol. director dan farah's film became a real sensation in america. unidentified anomalous phenomena, or as we used to call them, ufos, exist. they spy on and interfere with nuclear and military facilities. they have crashed on earth, and the remains of alien bodies have
